Simply choose your TV provider and follow the directions along the way. Get access to more than 1,000+ live sporting events that air on NBC, NBC Sports Network, Comcast SportsNet and Golf Channel.
Simply choose your TV provider and follow the directions along the way. Get access to more than 1,000+ hours of Olympic live streaming and full event replays.

We may share the information above with:

By using this Application (“App”), I affirmatively consent that NBCUniversal (“NBC Uni”) may use and share my video viewing information with third parties for up to 2 years or consent is withdrawn. I specifically agree that NBC Uni may collect, track and share the following types of information about me when I use this App:
· “Social Networks”: Companies that connect individuals around common interests and facilitate sharing (e.g., Facebook).
· Unique Device Identifier: the unique series of numbers and letters assigned to my device.
· Videos Viewing: the video/streaming content I access via this App. NBC Uni may track your video viewing for our research, analytics or ad serving purposes.

NBC Sports Live Extra is a service offered through participating TV Providers that allows you to access to Golf Channel coverage of live events and full event replays.
Most TV providers offer a simple way to retrieve or reset your password. Please contact your TV provider or visit their website to learn more.
The NBC sports Live Extra app is available for both iOS & Android devices. Visit the iTunes App store of Google Play store to download this FREE app.
Yes. You can access NBC sports Live Extra from your desktop computer, laptop, or mobile device, anywhere within the U.S.
Yes, you can continue to visit www.nbcsports.com to access event clips, highlights, and expert commentary without a Pay TV subscription.
There are some events/tours that are not currently available on this service. We are working to add more events, so continue to check back to see what additions we have made.
"This is a free app. It's an added value to your regular TV subscription through participating television providers."
Currently, this service is only available in the U.S.

When prompted, select your TV provider. You will then be asked to enter your TV username and password; similar to when you pay your bill online. When prompted, select your TV provider. You will then be asked to enter your TV username and password; similar to when you pay your bill online. your username and password, please contact your TV provider to learn more.

If you already have a username and password from your TV provider, you will not need to create a new account. If you have not previously registered an account with your TV provider, you will need to do so with a valid email address. Please contact your TV provider to learn more
Once you are signed in to the app, you can select the Schedule tab to see a listing of events that will be available to watch LIVE.
